title: McDonald's Giving Happy Meal Toys a Makeover
itunes:title: McDonald's Giving Happy Meal Toys a Makeover
description:
McDonald's Chief Sustainability Officer Jenny McColloch discusses the fast-food chain pledging to phase out plastic toys in Happy Meals by 2025.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
